body_html:
No, no virtualenv.
Here is the sys.path:

petrux@orion:~$ python -c "import sys; print(sys.path)"
['', '/usr/local/spark-2.1.0-bin-hadoop2.7/python',
'/usr/local/spark-2.1.0-bin-hadoop2.7/python/lib/py4j-0.10.4-src.zip',
'/home/petrux', '/usr/lib/python2.7',
'/usr/lib/python2.7/plat-x86_64-linux-gnu',
'/usr/lib/python2.7/lib-tk',
'/usr/lib/python2.7/lib-old',
'/usr/lib/python2.7/lib-dynload',
'/home/petrux/.local/lib/python2.7/site-packages',
'/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages',
'/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages',
'/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/PILcompat',
'/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/gst-0.10',
'/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/gtk-2.0',
'/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/ubuntu-sso-client']

petrux@orion:~$ ipython -c "import sys; print(sys.path)"
['', '/usr/local/bin', '/usr/local/spark-2.1.0-bin-hadoop2.7/python',
'/usr/local/spark-2.1.0-bin-hadoop2.7/python/lib/py4j-0.10.4-src.zip',
'/home/petrux',
'/usr/lib/python2.7',
'/usr/lib/python2.7/plat-x86_64-linux-gnu',
'/usr/lib/python2.7/lib-tk',
'/usr/lib/python2.7/lib-old',
'/usr/lib/python2.7/lib-dynload', 
'/home/petrux/.local/lib/python2.7/site-packages', 
'/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages', 
'/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages', 
'/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/PILcompat', 
'/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/gst-0.10',
'/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/gtk-2.0', 
'/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/ubuntu-sso-client', 
'/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/IPython/extensions', 
'/home/petrux/.ipython']

petrux@orion:~$ python3 -c "import sys; print(sys.path)"
['', '/usr/local/spark-2.1.0-bin-hadoop2.7/python', 
'/usr/local/spark-2.1.0-bin-hadoop2.7/python/lib/py4j-0.10.4-src.zip', 
'/home/petrux', 
'/usr/lib/python35.zip', 
'/usr/lib/python3.5', 
'/usr/lib/python3.5/plat-x86_64-linux-gnu', 
'/usr/lib/python3.5/lib-dynload', 
'/home/petrux/.local/lib/python3.5/site-packages', 
'/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages', 
'/usr/lib/python3/dist-packages']

petrux@orion:~$ ipython3 -c "import sys; print(sys.path)"
['', '/usr/local/bin', 
'/usr/local/spark-2.1.0-bin-hadoop2.7/python', 
'/usr/local/spark-2.1.0-bin-hadoop2.7/python/lib/py4j-0.10.4-src.zip', 
'/home/petrux', 
'/usr/lib/python35.zip', 
'/usr/lib/python3.5', 
'/usr/lib/python3.5/plat-x86_64-linux-gnu', 
'/usr/lib/python3.5/lib-dynload', 
'/home/petrux/.local/lib/python3.5/site-packages',

'/home/petrux/.ipython']

body:
No, no virtualenv.  
Here is the `sys.path`:

```bash
petrux@orion:~$ python -c "import sys; print(sys.path)"
['', '/usr/local/spark-2.1.0-bin-hadoop2.7/python',

'/home/petrux', '/usr/lib/python2.7',
'/usr/lib/python2.7/plat-x86_64-linux-gnu',
'/usr/lib/python2.7/lib-tk',
'/usr/lib/python2.7/lib-old',
'/usr/lib/python2.7/lib-dynload',
'/home/petrux/.local/lib/python2.7/site-packages',
'/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages',
'/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages',
'/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/PILcompat',
'/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/gst-0.10',
'/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/gtk-2.0',
'/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/ubuntu-sso-client']
```
